DOC.brief_summary: This study 8-week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial intranasal insulin adjunctive therapy , 4-week follow-up , 60 non-diabetic schizophrenia subject examine insulin 's effect psychopathology cognition . In addition , study examine insulin 's effect weight , food intake , rest energy expenditure , body composition .
DOC.brief_title: Intranasal Insulin Treatment Patients With Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim include : Primary aim 1 . Examine efficacy intranasal regular insulin ( 40 IU 4 time per day ) improve cognitive deficit patient schizophrenia . 2 . Examine efficacy intranasal regular insulin improve negative symptom positive symptom schizophrenia . Secondary aim 1 . Examine intranasal insulin 's effect weight , food intake rest energy expenditure . 2 . Examine intranasal insulin 's effect body composition , waist circumference , waist/hip ratio .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1865 year . 2 . Diagnosis schizophrenia , subtype schizoaffective disorder , subtype . 3 . Stable dose current antipsychotic drug least one month . 4 . Well establish compliance outpatient treatment per treat clinician 's judgement . 5 . Able complete cognitive assessment battery ( must English speaking ) . 6 . Female subject eligible participate study nonchildbearing potential childbearing potential willing practice appropriate birth control method ( complete abstinence sexual intercourse , female sterilization , sterilization male partner , implant levonorgestrel , injectable progestogen , oral contraceptive , intrauterine device , double barrier method contraception use spermicide either condom diaphragm ) study . 1 . Inability provide inform consent . 2 . Current substance abuse . 3 . Psychiatrically unstable per treat clinician 's judgement . 4 . Significant medical illness include uncontrolled hypertension , diabetes , seizure . disorder , severe cardiovascular , cerebrovascular , pulmonary , thyroid disease . 5 . Pregnancy breastfeeding .
